LanguageData.SupernovaExp_low: At a distance of several hundred thousand light years, a supernova explosion occurred. It will not cause harm, but will allow to observe a beautiful sight.
LanguageData.SupernovaExp_medium: At a distance of several tens of thousands of light years, a supernova explosion occurred. Expect a small meteor shower, temperature increase
LanguageData.SupernovaExp_high: At a distance of several thousand light years, a supernova explosion occurred. Expect heavy meteor showers, a very strong temperature increase and a long day.
LanguageData.SupernovaExp_ultra: At a distance of several hundred light years, a supernova explosion occurred. There will be hell, brave yourself.
LanguageData.ShipPartTimeout: \nProbably the wreckage will be looted in (days):
LanguageData.EnemyOnTheMap: There are still enemies on the map. You can not form a caravan now.
LanguageData.SuccessDisarmingDesc: The climate bomb was cleared successfully. In the demining process, an element was found that seemed to be the main source of energy. Your people were able to steal it. With it, it will probably be possible to create a new source of energy.
LanguageData.DefusingInfo:
Attempt to demine the bomb

Your colonists report that trying to defuse a bomb can activate bomb defenses that are likely to attract many other people here.

Get ready for the battle!
LanguageData.ZeroPointReactorDestablishedDesc: The zero point reactor is destabilized and is about to fail. The vacuum core attracts the nearest pawns carefully!
LanguageData.YourAttackWasRepelledDesc: Your attack on the enemy camp failed. They will take into account their mistakes in defense and, probably, can rebuild their defense. The surviving colonists are probably dead or sold into slavery.
LanguageData.AttackIsNotRepelled: You can not leave now. The attack is not yet reflected.
LanguageData.AttackFriendlySettlementLetter1: Scout friendly settlement {0} report that one of the enemy settlements is preparing an attack on them. They ask you for help. Unfortunately, the level of threat is not known. (To help the settlement, send a caravan to it and repel the attack)
LanguageData.AttackFriendlySettlementLetter2: Scout friendly settlement {0} report that one of the enemy settlements is preparing an attack on them. They ask you for help. Threat Level: {1} (To help the settlement, send a caravan to it and repel the attack)
LanguageData.AttackedFriendlySettlementDefendHelp: You have arrived. Set up a defense, the settlers of the friendly settlement are at your disposal. Remember that you need to save as many lives as possible!
LanguageData.AttackedFriendlySettlementDefendVictory:
You beat off the attack.
{0} Thank you. In total, you were able to save the life of {1} settlers, for which you get a reward:
 {2} 

She is waiting for you on a friendly base. You can pick it up when you form a caravan or at any other time.
LanguageData.AttackedFriendlySettlementDefendLoseWith: You fought off the attack, but you could not save a single friendly settler.\nYou simply have no one to give a reward, and a friendly settlement is broken.
LanguageData.AttackedFriendlySettlementLoseWithoutHel: You didn’t help settlement {0}, reputation lowered.
